SELECT org.* FROM sys_org_closure c INNER JOIN sys_org_units org ON c.descendant_id = org.id WHERE c.ancestor_id = #{ancestorId} AND c.customer_id = #{customerId} AND c.depth = 1 AND org.is_deleted = 0 AND org.status = '1' ORDER BY org.sort ASC, org.id ASC
